name: Dark Google Voice now customizable! - June 8 (WIP)
description:
***If you use this please comment and rate it. I would like to know what you guys think, and what should be changed.***

Screenshot: http://i656.photobucket.com/albums/uu284/UserStyles/Google_Voice/preview_v4.png
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


To customize the style's colors change the color in the 10th line from default "#222" to any color. You can use words for colors, example background-color:blue or you can use hex codes

Hex color Generator:
www.2createawebsite.com/build/hex-colors.html

___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Add-ons:
Firefox - addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/2108/
Chrome  - chrome.google.com/extensions/detail/plcnnpdmhobdfbponjpedobekiogmbco

How to install:
Chrome - http://doiop.com/DarkGVoice_Chrome_Tutorial                 
Firefox - N/A I'll post at a later time. 
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

June 4 2010
-Rewrote style, It now looks very different 
from the original style.

June 6 2010
-Made the Style very easy to custimize
-The message backgrounds are darker
-various bugs were fixed

June 8 2010
-styled the following pages
     •contacts page
     •setting's page
     •Google voice Login page
